biography: Luca Zingaretti was born on November 11, 1961 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and director, known for Inspector Montalbano (1999), Come Into the Light (2005) and La nostra vita (2010). He has been married to Luisa Ranieri since May 23, 2012. They have two daughters, Emma (born July 9 2011) & Bianca (bornJuly 27 2015).
name: Luca Zingaretti
